job_history.work_description: Perform bank product cross sale, handle large currency, deal with client inquiries, process wire transfers, and perform other banking tasks. Delivered informational sales presentations to potential investors and maintained a high client retention rate.

Collaborated with legal and accounting counsel to develop marketing strategies for estate and business succession planning insurance. Delivered informational sales presentations to potential investors and maintained a high client retention rate.

Executed financial due diligence, created a valuation model, and performed both Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable functions. Utilized MAS 90, 200, Peachtree accounting, and MS Office software programs.
Achieved proper compliance and accurate executive level reporting. Created release and project plans, established stakeholder expectations, and prepared Bank reconciliation daily.

skills.name: Banking Operations
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling banking tasks, including client inquiries, wire transfers, and sales presentations, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Executed financial due diligence, created a valuation model, and performed financial reporting, showing strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in various accounting roles, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Sales and Marketing
skills.explanation: Delivered informational sales presentations to potential investors and maintained a high client retention rate, suggesting strong proficiency in sales and marketing.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Created release and project plans, established stakeholder expectations, showing a solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Utilized MS Office software programs extensively, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Bank Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Performed Bank reconciliation daily, indicating strong proficiency in bank reconciliation.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Achieved proper compliance and accurate executive level reporting, showing strong proficiency in financial reporting.
